Text: You must use it on Kontakt?

you have to use Hj-split to extract this files, just run the program and open the first file (.001) through it and press 'join' then extract the zip file created normally. you have to remember that is an iso file that 's inside the zip
I used Split & Concat to make one big zip file, then Stuffit Expander to expand the iso file. It works fine with Kontakt 4.1.1 minus some graphical issues...
